description.english: Act I complete
description.schinese: 完成第一幕的剧情
description.tchinese: 完成第一幕的劇情
description.russian: Завершение сюжета первого акта
description.french: Terminer l’intrigue de la première scène
description.koreana: 제1막 스토리 완료
description.spanish: Completar la Trama del Acto 1

description.english: Act II Complete
description.schinese: 完成第二幕的剧情
description.tchinese: 完成第二幕的劇情
description.russian: Завершение сюжета второго акта
description.french: Terminer l’intrigue de la deuxième scène
description.koreana: 제2막 스토리 완료
description.spanish: Completar la Trama del Acto 2

description.english: Successfully escaped the compound and survived
description.schinese: 成功逃离了园区，成为幸存者
description.tchinese: 成功逃離了園區，成為倖存者
description.russian: Успешный побег из парка — вы стали выжившим
description.french: S’être échappé avec succès du parc,devenu survivant
description.koreana: 에덴 탈출에 성공, 생존자가 되었다
description.spanish: Escapar con Éxito del Parque y Convertirse en Superviviente

description.english: Sold to Paradise Village: A samsara
description.schinese: 被贩卖至天堂寨，命运再次重现
description.tchinese: 被販賣至天堂寨，命運再次重現
description.russian: Продан в «Райскую деревню» — судьба повторяется
description.french: Vendu au paradis de Zhai, le destin se répète
description.koreana: 천당채에 팔려가, 운명이 다시 되풀이되었다
description.spanish: Ser Vendido al Paraíso Fortaleza, el Destino Regresa Nuevamente

description.english: Destroyed the compound with wisdom and elaborate planning, and gained freedom
description.schinese: 依靠智慧和计划摧毁了园区，获得了新生
description.tchinese: 依靠智慧和計畫摧毀了園區，獲得了新生
description.russian: Уничтожил парк благодаря уму и плану — обрёл новую жизнь
description.french: Détruire le parc en s'appuyant sur la sagesse et un plan, obtenir une nouvelle vie
description.koreana: 지혜와 계획으로 에덴을 무너뜨리고, 새로운 삶을 얻었다
description.spanish: Destruir el Parque con Sabiduría y Planes, Obtener una Nueva Vida

description.english: Ambitiously became the new master of the compound with the help of woman
description.schinese: 依靠野心和女人，成为了园区新的主人
description.tchinese: 依靠野心和女人，成為了園區新的主人
description.russian: Стал новым хозяином парка благодаря амбициям и женщинам
description.french: Devenir le nouveau maître du parc en s'appuyant sur l'ambition et les femmes
description.koreana: 야심과 여자를 통해, 에덴의 새로운 주인이 되었다
description.spanish: Convertirse en el Nuevo Dueño del Parque por Ambición y Mujeres

description.english: Failed to completely destroy the compound and was forced to become its new master
description.schinese: 未能最终摧毁园区，被迫成为了园区新的主人
description.tchinese: 未能最終摧毀園區，被迫成為了園區新的主人
description.russian: Не смог окончательно уничтожить парк, вынужден стать её новым хозяином
description.french: Ne pas avoir finalement détruit le parc, forcé de devenir son nouveau maître
description.koreana: 결국 에덴을 무너뜨리지 못하고,  에덴의 새 주인이 되었다
description.spanish: No Poder Destruir el Parque Finalmente, Ser Obligado a Ser el Nuevo Dueño del Parque

description.english: Unlock all 15 the documents about Eden in the Archives
description.schinese: 解锁资料馆中伊甸园全部的15份资料
description.tchinese: 解鎖資料館中伊甸園全部的15份資料
description.russian: Разблокировать все 15 материалов об Эдеме в архиве
description.french: Débloquer les quinze documents du Jardin d'Éden dans les archives
description.koreana: 자료관: 에덴 자료 15/15 개 획득 완료
description.spanish: Desbloquear las 15 Informaciones Completas del Edén en la Biblioteca

description.english: Unlock all 15 characters in the Archives
description.schinese: 解锁资料馆中全部的15个人物
description.tchinese: 解鎖資料館中全部的15個人物
description.russian: Разблокировать всех 15 персонажей в архиве
description.french: Débloquer les quinze personnages complets dans les archives
description.koreana: 자료관: 인물 15/15 명 해제 완료
description.spanish: Desbloquear los 15 Personajes Completos en la Biblioteca

description.english: Complete Act III in any endings with Sin Level 0
description.schinese: 在第三幕任意结局时罪恶值为0
description.tchinese: 在第三幕任意結局時罪惡值為0
description.russian: Криминальный уровень равен 0 в любом финале третьего акта
description.french: À la fin de la troisième scène, quelle que soit l'issue, la valeur du péché est de zéro
description.koreana: 제3막 어떤 엔딩에서도 죄악치가 0이었다
description.spanish: 0 Valor del Pecado 0 en Cualquier Final del Acto 0

description.english: Complete Act III in any endings with Sin Level over 30
description.schinese: 在第三幕任意结局时罪恶值超过30
description.tchinese: 在第三幕任意結局時罪惡值超過30
description.russian: Криминальный уровень превышает 30 в любом финале третьего акта
description.french: À la fin de la troisième scène, si le score de méchanceté dépasse trente
description.koreana: 제3막 어떤 엔딩에서 죄악치가 30을 넘었다
description.spanish: Valor del Pecado Más de 30 en Cualquier Final del Acto 30

description.english: After drinking Mermaid’s Tears, Hongling rewards you
description.schinese: 喝下人鱼之泪后，红绫给了你奖励
description.tchinese: 喝下人魚之淚後，紅綾給了你獎勵
description.russian: Выпив слёзы русалки, получил награду от Хунлин
description.french: Après avoir bu les larmes de la sirène, Hongling vous a donné une récompense
description.koreana: 인어의 눈물을 마신 후, 홍릉한테 보상을 받았다
description.spanish: Después de Beber las Lágrimas de la Sirena, la Línea Roja Te Da una Recompensa

description.english: First met A-Lian while she was job hunting
description.schinese: 初次相遇正在找工作的阿莲
description.tchinese: 初次相遇正在找工作的阿蓮
description.russian: Первая встреча с Алянь, ищущей работу
description.french: Rencontrer pour la première fois A'Lian qui cherche un travail
description.koreana: 일자리를 찾고 있던 아련과의 첫 만남
description.spanish: Conocer por Primera Vez a A Lian que Busca Trabajo

description.english: Discovered that Suxin’s job isn’t as simple as it seems
description.schinese: 发现素心的工作并不简单
description.tchinese: 發現素心的工作並不簡單
description.russian: Обнаружил, что работа Сусинь не так проста
description.french: Découvrir que le travail de Suxin n'est pas simple
description.koreana: 소심의 일이 간단하지 않음을 발견했다
description.spanish: Descubrir que el Trabajo de Su Xin no es Sencillo

description.english: Because I helped Xixi, I gained her cooperation
description.schinese: 因为帮助了西西，获得了她的合作
description.tchinese: 因為幫助了西西，獲得了她的合作
description.russian: Помог Сиси и заслужил её признание
description.french: Parce qu'il a aidé Xixi, il a obtenu sa coopération
description.koreana: 시시를 도와서 그녀의 협력을 얻었다
description.spanish: Por ayudar a Xixi, obtuve su colaboración

description.english: Identified the target of this special assignment
description.schinese: 发现此次特殊工作的目标人物
description.tchinese: 發現此次特殊工作的目標人物
description.russian: Выявил цель этой особой опепрации
description.french: Découvrir la cible de cette mission spéciale
description.koreana: 이번 특별 임무의 목표 인물을 발견했다
description.spanish: Descubrir el Personaje Objetivo de Este Trabajo Especial

description.english: Received your compound ID number
description.schinese: 获得了你在园区的编号
description.tchinese: 獲得了你在園區的編號
description.russian: Получил свой номер в парке
description.french: Obtenir votre numéro dans le parc
description.koreana: 에덴 내의 번호를 부여받았다
description.spanish: Obtener Tu Número en el Parque

description.english: Kept your promise to Chen and gave him a pack of cigarettes
description.schinese: 兑现了对老陈的承诺，给他了一包烟
description.tchinese: 兌現了對老陳的承諾，給他了一包烟
description.russian: Выполнил обещание Лао Чэню — дал ему пачку сигарет
description.french: Avoir tenu la promesse faite à Laochen en lui donnant un paquet de cigarettes
description.koreana: 진 씨과의 약속을 지켜 담배 한 갑을 주었다
description.spanish: Cumplir la Promesa al Viejo Chen y Darle un Paquete de Cigarrillos

displayName.spanish: El Secreto de la Línea Roja

description.english: Learned Hongling’s secret
description.schinese: 知晓了红绫的秘密
description.tchinese: 知曉了紅綾的秘密
description.russian: Узнал тайну Хунлин
description.french: Avoir découvert le secret de Hongling
description.koreana: 홍릉의 비밀을 알게 되었다
description.spanish: Enterarse del Secreto de la Línea Roja

description.english: After giving her 1000 chips, Spent a beautiful recreation day with A-Lian
description.schinese: 送给阿莲1000筹码后，与阿莲美好共度放风日
description.tchinese: 送給阿蓮1000籌碼後，與阿蓮美好共度放風日
description.russian: Прекрасно провёл день с Алянь на прогулке
description.french: Avoir passé une belle journée de liberté avec A'Lian
description.koreana: 아련과 함께 즐거운 외출일을 보냈다
description.spanish: Pasar un Día de Aire Hermoso con A Lian

description.english: Apology didn’t work—A-Lian didn’t seem to have forgiven you
description.schinese: 道歉没用，阿莲似乎不原谅你
description.tchinese: 道歉沒用，阿蓮似乎不原諒你
description.russian: Извинения не помогли — Алянь, кажется, не прощает
description.french: Les excuses n'ont servi à rien, A'Lian semble ne pas vous pardonner
description.koreana: 사과는 소용없었고, 아련은 널 용서하지 않는 듯하다
description.spanish: La Disculpa no Sirve, A Lian Parece no Perdonarte

description.english: Uncovered the story behind Suxin’s photo
description.schinese: 发现素心照片的故事
description.tchinese: 發現素心照片的故事
description.russian: Узнал историю на фотографии Сусинь
description.french: Avoir découvert l'histoire derrière la photo de Suxin
description.koreana: 소심의 사진에 관한 이야기를 발견했다
description.spanish: Descubrir la Historia de la Foto de Su Xin

description.english: Realized Xixi’s story implied something unknown
description.schinese: 发现西西的故事似乎内涵了什么
description.tchinese: 發現西西的故事似乎內涵了什麼
description.russian: Обнаружил скрытый смысл в истории Сиси
description.french: Avoir compris que l'histoire de Xixi semblait contenir un sens caché
description.koreana: 시시의 이야기는 무엇을 가리키고 있음을 발견했다
description.spanish: Descubrir que la Historia de Xi Xi Parece Tener un Significado Oculto

displayName.spanish: Las Pruebas del Crimen de Bai Xiao

description.english: Showed Bai Xiao evidence of the sin in the charity's financial reports
description.schinese: 与白晓对峙慈善财报的罪证
description.tchinese: 與白曉對峙慈善財報的罪證
description.russian: Предъявил Байсяо доказательства преступления в финансовом отчёте
description.french: Avoir confronté Bai Xiao avec les preuves de crime dans le rapport financier de charité
description.koreana: 백효와 대치하여 자선 재무 보고서의 죄증을 확인했다
description.spanish: Enfrentarse a Bai Xiao con las Pruebas del Informe Financiero de Caridad

description.english: Shi Lei entrusted his sister to you—his ultimate act of trust
description.schinese: 石磊将妹妹托付于你是对你最大的信任
description.tchinese: 石磊將妹妹託付於你是對你最大的信任
description.russian: Шилэй доверил тебе свою сестру — это высшее доверие
description.french: Shilei vous a confié sa sœur, c'est la plus grande marque de confiance envers vous
description.koreana: 석뢰가 여동생을 너에게 부탁한 것은 가장 큰 신뢰였다
description.spanish: Que Shi Lei Te Encargue a Su Hermana es la Mayor Confianza en Ti

description.english: You gave the chance to survive to Hongling—a truly noble choice
description.schinese: 你无私的选择把生还机会留给了红绫
description.tchinese: 你無私的選擇把生還機會留給了紅綾
description.russian: Ты выбрал оставить шанс на выживание Хунлин — это великодушно
description.french: Vous avez choisi de laisser la chance de survie à Hongling, très noble
description.koreana: 생환 기회를 홍릉에게 양보한 너의 선택은 매우 위대했다
description.spanish: Elegir Dejar la Oportunidad de Vida a la Línea Roja, Muy Grande

description.english: You gave the chance to survive to A-Lian—a truly noble choice
description.schinese: 你无私的选择把生还机会留给了阿莲
description.tchinese: 你無私的選擇把生還機會留給了阿蓮
description.russian: Ты выбрал оставить шанс на выживание Алянь — это великодушно
description.french: Vous avez choisi de laisser la chance de survie à A'Lian, très noble
description.koreana: 생환 기회를 아련에게 양보한 너의 선택은 매우 위대했다
description.spanish: Elegir Dejar la Oportunidad de Vida a A Lian, Muy Grande

description.english: Learned about Suxin’s rescue plan
description.schinese: 得知了素心的救人计划
description.tchinese: 得知了素心的救人計畫
description.russian: Узнал план спасения Сусинь
description.french: Avoir appris le plan de sauvetage de Suxin
description.koreana: 소심의 구조 계획을 알게 되었다
description.spanish: Elegir Dejar la Oportunidad de Vida a A Lian, Muy Grande

description.english: You and Xixi admired each other
description.schinese: 你与西西彼此相互欣赏
description.tchinese: 你與西西彼此相互欣賞
description.russian: Вы с Сиси взаимно цените друг друга
description.french: Vous et Xixi vous appréciez mutuellement
description.koreana: 너와 시시 서로에 호감이 있다.
description.spanish: Tú y Xi Xi os Admiráis Mutuamente

description.english: Your words have strengthened Bai Xiao's decision
description.schinese: 你的言语让白晓坚定了自己的选择
description.tchinese: 你的言語讓白曉堅定了自己的選擇
description.russian: Твои слова укрепили выбор Байсяо
description.french: Vos paroles ont renforcé le choix de Baixiao
description.koreana: 너의 말로 백효가 자신의 선택을 확신하게 했다
description.spanish: Tus Palabras Hacen que Bai Xiao Afirme su Elección

description.english: After the Fate Ending: Hongling was rescued
description.schinese: 命运结局之后，红绫获救了
description.tchinese: 命運結局之後，紅綾獲救了
description.russian: После финала судьбы Хунлин спасена
description.french: Après la fin du Destin, Hongling a été sauvée
description.koreana: 운명 엔딩 이후, 홍릉이 구조되었다
description.spanish: Después del Final del Destino, la Línea Roja es Rescatada

description.english: After the perfect ending, Hong Ling became an anti fraud anchor
description.schinese: 完美结局之后，红绫成为了一名反诈主播
description.tchinese: 完美結局之後，紅綾成為了一名反詐主播
description.russian: После идеального финала Хунлин стала стримером против мошенничества
description.french: Après la fin Parfaite, Hongling est devenue une streamer de lutte contre la fraude
description.koreana: 완벽한 엔딩 이후, 홍릉이 사기 방지 BJ가 되었다
description.spanish: Después del Final Perfecto, la Línea Roja se Convierte en una Streamer Anti-Fraude

description.english: After the Perfect Ending, Hongling became an anti-scam streamer
description.schinese: 幸存结局之后，素心惊喜的发现你还活着
description.tchinese: 倖存結局之後，素心驚喜的發現你還活著
description.russian: После финала выжившего Сусинь с радостью обнаружила, что ты жив
description.french: Après la fin de Survivant, Suxin a découvert avec surprise que vous étiez toujours en vie
description.koreana: 생존자 엔딩 이후, 소심이 너의 생환에 놀랍고 기뻤다.
description.spanish: Después del Final de Supervivencia, Su Xin Descubre con Sorpresa que Estás Vivo

description.english: After the Perfect Ending: Suxin became the chief physician
description.schinese: 完美结局之后，素心成为了主治医生
description.tchinese: 完美結局之後，素心成為了主治醫生
description.russian: После идеального финала Суси нь стала главным врачом
description.french: Après la fin Parfaite, Suxin est devenue médecin-chef
description.koreana: 완벽한 엔딩 이후, 소심이 주치의가 되었다
description.spanish: Después del Final Perfecto, Su Xin se Convierte en Médico Titular

description.english: After the Underdog Ending, You and Xixi were about to be arrested
description.schinese: 逆袭结局之后，你和西西即将被捕
description.tchinese: 逆襲結局之後，你和西西即將被捕
description.russian: После финала триумфа аутсайдера ты и Сиси скоро будете арестованы
description.french: Après la fin du Retournement, vous et Xixi êtes sur le point d'être arrêtés
description.koreana: 역습 엔딩 이후, 너와 시시가 체포 직전에 이르렀다
description.spanish: Después del Final de Reversión, Tú y Xi Xi Están a Punto de Ser Arrestados

description.english: After the Perfect Ending, Xixi was sentenced to prison
description.schinese: 完美结局之后，西西获刑入狱
description.tchinese: 完美結局之後，西西獲刑入獄
description.russian: После идеального финала Сиси приговорена к тюрьме
description.french: Après la fin Parfaite, Xixi a été condamnée et emprisonnée
description.koreana: 완벽 엔딩 이후, 시시가 형을 받아 투옥되었다
description.spanish: Después del Final Perfecto, Xi Xi es Condenada a Prisión

description.english: After the Underdog Ending, A-Lian gained a chance at rescue
description.schinese: 逆袭结局之后，阿莲获得了被救的可能
description.tchinese: 逆襲結局之後，阿蓮獲得了被救的可能
description.russian: После финала триумфа аутсайдера у Алянь появился шанс на спасение
description.french: Après la fin du Retournement, A'Lian a obtenu une possibilité de sauvetage
description.koreana: 역습 엔딩 이후, 아련이 구조될 가능성을 얻었다
description.spanish: Después del Final de Reversión, A Lian Obtiene la Posibilidad de Ser Rescatada

description.english: After the Perfect Ending, A-Lian treated you to a meal
description.schinese: 完美结局之后，阿莲请你吃饭
description.tchinese: 完美結局之後，阿蓮請你吃飯
description.russian: После идеального финала Алянь пригласила тебя на ужин
description.french: Après la fin Parfaite, A'Lian vous a invité à manger
description.koreana: 완벽 엔딩 이후, 아련이 너에게 밥을 사줬다
description.spanish: Después del Final Perfecto, A Lian te Invita a Comer

description.english: After the Underdog Ending, Bai Xiao took poison and committed suicide
description.schinese: 逆袭结局之后，白晓服药自尽
description.tchinese: 逆襲結局之後，白曉服藥自盡
description.russian: После финала триумфа аутсайдера Байсяо покончил с собой, приняв яд
description.french: Après la fin du Retournement, Bai Xiao s'est suicidé(e) en prenant des médicaments
description.koreana: 역습 엔딩 이후, 백효가 약물을 먹어 자살했다
description.spanish: Después del Final de Reversión, Bai Xiao se Suicida Tomando Medicamentos

description.english: After the Perfect Ending, Bai Xiao made a sincere confession
description.schinese: 完美结局之后，白晓认真告白
description.tchinese: 完美結局之後，白曉認真告白
description.russian: После идеального финала Бай Сяо искренне признался в любви
description.french: Après la fin Parfaite, Bai Xiao vous a fait une déclaration sincère
description.koreana: 완벽 엔딩 이후, 백효가 진심으로 고백했다
description.spanish: Después del Final Perfecto, Bai Xiao Hace una Confesión Sincera

description.english: After the Fate Ending, you discovered Shi Lei’s true nature
description.schinese: 命运结局之后，发现了石磊的真面目
description.tchinese: 命運結局之後，發現了石磊的真面目
description.russian: После финала судьбы раскрылась истинное лицо Шилэя
description.french: Après la fin du Destin, la vraie nature de Shi Lei a été découverte
description.koreana: 운명 엔딩 이후, 석뢰의 진짜 모습을 발견했다
description.spanish: Después del Final del Destino, Descubrir la Verdadera Cara de Shi Lei

description.english: Achieving a perfect ending in the Challenger mode, annihilating the park with one life
description.schinese: 在挑战者模式下达成完美结局，一命覆灭园区
description.tchinese: 在挑戰者模式下達成完美結局，一命覆滅園區
description.russian: Достичь идеального конца в режиме Challenger, уничтожив парк за один ход
description.french: Obtenir une fin parfaite en mode Challenger, tout détruire d'un seul coup
description.koreana: 채린저 모드에서 완벽한 엔딩을 달성하고, 한 생명으로 공원을 무너뜨렸다
description.spanish: Alcanzar un final perfecto en el modo Challenger, arrasar el parque con una sola vida
